_sText:
This map is specifically made for DZK (Deutscher Zocker Kreis) but may well be enjoying to play for other servers aswell. Like said it is a small tribute map for a gungame server of them.
It gets it's name from the topview, where you can read the letters "D Z K" in the form of a house and swimming pool. There's a little monitor in the house that shows the topview aswell (aswell as players who walk about outside).

Also this map is my first map that contains a custom radar, meaning you can pinpoint the positions of spotted enemies on the minimap (aswell as the overview when spectating). It is a little buggy at the CT-spawn, but it functions alright.
